creator: Daniel.Barclay@digitalfocus.com
text:
The description of the "ant" task doesn't say whether filesets, classpaths,
patters, etc., of the calling project are passed to the called project.

creator: mike@hihat.net
text:
Created attachment 134
Patch to the ant taskdef to propagate references/filters to called project
Starting with Ant 1.5 it will talk about these.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
